segments.text: What is going on in here? The sink is overflowing, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like everything is fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, oh the kids are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool, and it's going to be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so frustrated that no one is doing anything about this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's like a completely different world out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just take control of this situation and fix it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just ridiculous, someone needs to do something now.
segments.speaker: PAR
